      • m3dRaySphereTest

        public static float m3dRaySphereTest(float[] v3Point,
                                     float[] v3Ray,
                                     float[] v3SphereCenter,
                                     float sphereRadius)
        Determine if a ray intersects a sphere. Return value is < 0 if the ray does not intersect. Return value is 0.0 if ray is tangent Positive value is distance to the intersection point.

        This function does a three dimensional Catmull-Rom curve interpolation. Pass four points, and a floating point number between 0.0 and 1.0. The curve is interpolated between the middle two points.
        Parameters:
        vec3Out -
        v3P0 -
        v3P1 -
        v3P2 -
        v3P3 -
        t -

      • m3dClosestPointOnRay

        public static float m3dClosestPointOnRay(float[] v3PointOnRay,
                                         float[] v3RayOrigin,
                                         float[] v3UnitRayDir,
                                         float[] v3PointInSpace)
        Closest point on a ray to another given point in space. As a bonus, return the distance squared of the two points.
        Parameters:
        vPointOnRay - Out: vPointOnRay is the poing on the ray closest to vPointInSpace
        vRayOrigin - In: vRayOrigin is the origin of the ray
        vUnitRayDir - In: vUnitRayDir is the unit vector of the ray
        vPointInSpace - In: vPointInSpace is the point in space
        Returns:
        The distance squared of the two points
